title: Hearing Voices
report: I abused diphenhydramine and dimenhydrinate on a regular basis w/ and without DXM for about 1-1/2 to 2 years.  Ever since then I hear voices every day, the same way I hear them when I am on a dramamine trip.  I recommend to never abuse either of these substances because hearing voices every day sucks.

erowid.citation: Bryan. "Hearing Voices: experience with diphenhydramine (Benadryl), Dimenhydrinate (Dramamine) & DXM (ID 77495)". Erowid.org. Mar 19, 2009. erowid.org/exp/77495
